n&acirc;ng t\u1ea7m du l\u1ecbch bi\u1ec3n B&igrave;nh Thu\u1eadn. T\u1ecda l\u1ea1c tr&ecirc;n cung \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u1eb9p nh\u1ea5t B&igrave;nh Thu\u1eadn, s\u1edf h\u1eefu th\u1ebf \u0111\u1ea5t &ldquo;t\u1ecda s\u01a1n h\u01b0\u1edbng th\u1ee7y&rdquo; h&uacute;t t&agrave;i gi\u1eef l\u1ed9c, Apec Mandala Wyndham M\u0169i N&eacute; n\u1ed5i l&ecirc;n nh\u01b0 m\u1ed9t \u1ed1c \u0111\u1ea3o xanh t\u01b0\u01a1i v\u1edbi thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o t\u1eeb c\u1ea3m h\u1ee9ng c\u1ee7a n\u1eafng, gi&oacute; v&agrave; ki\u1ebfn tr&uacute;c Ch\u0103m Pa \u0111\u1ed9c b\u1ea3n.&nbsp; Apec Mandala Wyndham M\u0169i N&eacute; mang \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 nh\u1eefng gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb s\u1ed1ng th\u01b0\u1ee3ng l\u01b0u, h\u1ed9i t\u1ee5 nh\u1eefng d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 gi\u1ea3i tr&iacute; \u0111\u1ec9nh cao v&agrave; v\u1eadn h&agrave;nh b\u1edfi th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3n l&yacute; kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ea7u th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi.<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li style=\"box-sizing: border-box; padding: 2px 0px; margin: 0px 20px; list-style: initial;\">\r\n\t<p><span><img alt=\"\" height=\"844\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/3(12).jpg\" width=\"1500\" \/><span title=\"K\u00e9o r\u00ea \u0111\u1ec3 thay \u0111\u1ed5i k\u00edch c\u1ee1\">\u200b<\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<h4>D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4<\/h4>\r\n\r\n\t<h2>CHU\u1ed6I TI\u1ec6N &Iacute;CH, D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4 5* CHU\u1ea8N QU\u1ed0C T\u1ebe<\/h2>\r\n\r\n\t<p>Apec Mandala Wyndham M\u0169i N&eacute; s\u1edf h\u1eefu chu\u1ed7i ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch, d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 5* chu\u1ea9n qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf, mang \u0111\u1ebfn nh\u1eefng tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p d&agrave;nh ri&ecirc;ng cho du kh&aacute;ch. V\u1edbi kh&ocirc;ng gian r\u1ed9ng ngay s&aacute;t bi\u1ec3n, Apec Mandala Wyndham M\u0169i N&eacute; s\u1edf h\u1eefu c&ocirc;ng vi&ecirc;n n\u01b0\u1edbc \u1ea5n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng c&ugrave;ng nhi\u1ec1u tr&ograve; ch\u01a1i h\u1ea5p d\u1eabn mang \u0111\u1ebfn cho du kh&aacute;ch nh\u1eefng gi\u1edd ph&uacute;t s\u1ea3ng kho&aacute;i v&agrave; tho\u1ea3i m&aacute;i nh\u1ea5t.&nbsp;&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<p>H\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng c&aacute;c b\u1ec3 b\u01a1i v&ocirc; c\u1ef1c view bi\u1ec3n cho c\u1ea3m nh\u1eadn ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng kh&aacute;c bi\u1ec7t ngay v\u1ecbnh thi&ecirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng M\u0169i N&eacute;. C&ugrave;ng v\u1edbi \u0111&oacute; l&agrave; h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng trung t&acirc;m th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i, spa, jjim jil bang, fitness, chu\u1ed7i nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng 5* \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p v&agrave; h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng bar, club \u1ea5n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng, h\u1ee9a h\u1eb9n mang \u0111\u1ebfn cho du kh&aacute;ch k&igrave; ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi b&ecirc;n v\u1ecbnh thi&ecirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng.<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li style=\"box-sizing: border-box; padding: 2px 0px; margin: 0px 20px; list-style: initial;\">\r\n\t<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" TH\u01af\u01a0NG M\u1ea0I D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4 V&Agrave; C\u0102N H\u1ed8 KH&Aacute;CH S\u1ea0N 5*<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>T\u1ecda l\u1ea1c t\u1ea1i v\u1ecb tr&iacute; &ldquo;kim c\u01b0\u01a1ng&rdquo; tr&ecirc;n tr\u1ee5c \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng huy\u1ebft m\u1ea1ch c\u1ee7a th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 bi\u1ec3n Tuy H&ograve;a &ndash; Ph&uacute; Y&ecirc;n, Apec Mandala Wyndham s\u1edf h\u1eefu v\u1ecb tr&iacute; 4 m\u1eb7t ti\u1ec1n tho&aacute;ng \u0111&atilde;ng, trong \u0111&oacute; m\u1eb7t ch&iacute;nh l&agrave; \u0111\u1ea1i l\u1ed9 H&ugrave;ng V\u01b0\u01a1ng. \u0110\u1ea1i l\u1ed9 H&ugrave;ng V\u01b0\u01a1ng l&agrave; t&acirc;m \u0111i\u1ec3m k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i v&ugrave;ng t\u1ea1i Ph&uacute; Y&ecirc;n, tr\u1ee5c \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng n\u1ed1i li\u1ec1n QL1A \u0111\u1ebfn s&acirc;n bay Tuy H&ograve;a v&agrave; \u0111\u1ebfn c&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecba danh n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng ho\u1eb7c khu v\u1ef1c l&acirc;n c\u1eadn kh&aacute;c.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>M\u1eb7t ngo&agrave;i t&ograve;a nh&agrave; l\u1ea5y c\u1ea3m h\u1ee9ng thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf t\u1eeb Gh\u1ec1nh \u0110&aacute; \u0110\u0129a t\u1ea1o ra m\u1eb7t \u0111\u1ee9ng b\u1eaft m\u1eaft v\u1ec1 th\u1ecb gi&aacute;c, v\u1edbi thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf n&agrave;y, t\u1eebng c\u0103n h\u1ed9 c\u1ee7a d\u1ef1 &aacute;n s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed1i \u01b0u h&oacute;a t\u1ea7m nh&igrave;n, &aacute;nh s&aacute;ng t\u1ef1 nhi&ecirc;n v&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng kh&iacute; t\u01b0\u01a1i, \u0111&uacute;ng &ldquo;ch\u1ea5t&rdquo; ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng. Trong khi \u0111&oacute;, n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a t&ograve;a kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n l\u1ea1i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1ea5y c\u1ea3m h\u1ee9ng t\u1eeb ki\u1ebfn tr&uacute;c T&acirc;y Nguy&ecirc;n, v\u1edbi bi\u1ebfn h&oacute;a \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u1ea1i, Apec Mandala Wyndham Ph&uacute; Y&ecirc;n&nbsp;&nbsp;t\u1ea1o n&ecirc;n kh&ocirc;ng gian c&aacute;c ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 v\u1eeba sang tr\u1ecdng hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i, v\u1eeba mang \u0111\u1eadm n&eacute;t v\u0103n h&oacute;a truy\u1ec1n th\u1ed1ng T&acirc;y Nguy&ecirc;n v\u1edbi h\u1ecda ti\u1ebft \u0111\u1eb7c tr\u01b0ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"900\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/1(13).jpg\" width=\"1600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n\r\n<h4>D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4<\/h4>\r\n\r\n<h2>H\u1ec6 TH\u1ed0NG TI\u1ec6N &Iacute;CH, D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4 N\u1ed4I B\u1eacT<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>Apec Mandala Wyndham Ph&uacute; Y&ecirc;n l&agrave; \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111\u1ebfn gi\u1ea3i tr&iacute; h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1ea1i \u0111&acirc;y v\u1edbi t\u1ed5 h\u1ee3p \u0111a ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch, d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 5* chu\u1ea9n qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf. T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c cung b\u1eadc \u0111a d\u1ea1ng c\u1ee7a cu\u1ed9c s\u1ed1ng, t\u1eeb th\u1ec3 thao, l&agrave;m \u0111\u1eb9p, mua s\u1eafm, hay nh\u1eefng b\u1eefa ti\u1ec7c th\u01b0\u1ee3ng l\u01b0u c&aacute;c ch\u1ee7 nh&acirc;n t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai \u0111\u1ec1u c&oacute; th\u1ec3 t\u1eadn h\u01b0\u1edfng ngay t\u1ea1i Apec Mandala Wyndham Ph&uacute; Y&ecirc;n. H\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng sky bar th\u01b0\u1ee3ng \u0111\u1ec9nh c&ugrave;ng b\u1ec3 b\u01a1i v&ocirc; c\u1ef1c tr&ecirc;n c&aacute;c t\u1ea7ng cao, nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng &Aacute;-&Acirc;u, caf&eacute; lounge, h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng gym, spa, jjim jil bang, h\u1ed9i tr\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111a n\u0103ng, khu vui ch\u01a1i tr\u1ebb em, &hellip;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" YEN","seo_description_cn":null,"seo_description_jp":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"1","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","opt3":"0","opt4":"0","opt5":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_1_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_1_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_jp":null,"google_map":"","is_dongdau":"0","time_dongdau":"0"},{"id":"140","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"KHU ph\u1ea1m vi khu \u0111&ocirc; th\u1ecb \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p Charm City, v&agrave; l&agrave; t&ograve;a th&aacute;p c\u0103n h\u1ed9 ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n 5 sao \u0111\u1ea7u ti&ecirc;n t\u1ea1i B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng. Charm Diamond - Vi&ecirc;n kim c\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1edbi r\u1ef1c s&aacute;ng tr&ecirc;n b\u1ea7u tr\u1eddi D\u0129 An, n\u01a1i an c\u01b0 sang tr\u1ecdng m\u1edf ra phong c&aacute;ch s\u1ed1ng th\u01b0\u1ee3ng l\u01b0u, ki\u1ebfn t\u1ea1o n&ecirc;n c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng tinh hoa b\u1eadc nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>T\u1ed5ng di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch khu&ocirc;n vi&ecirc;n: 5,2 hecta<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>3 blocks t&ograve;a th&aacute;p Charm Sapphire, Charm Ruby v&agrave; Charm Diamond v\u1edbi 2047 c\u0103n h\u1ed9 cao c\u1ea5p.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" Block B &ndash; 35 t\u1ea7ng<br \/>\r\n<strong>T\u1ed5ng s\u1ed1 c\u0103n h\u1ed9:<\/strong>&nbsp;2 block v\u1edbi 1.165 c\u0103n<br \/>\r\n<strong>S\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng:<\/strong><br \/>\r\n&nbsp; t\u1ecda \u0111\u1ed9 s\u1ea7m u\u1ea5t b\u1eadc nh\u1ea5t TP Th\u1ee7 D\u1ea7u M\u1ed9t, nh\u1edd \u0111&oacute;, c\u01b0 d&acirc;n d\u1ec5 d&agrave;ng tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m h\u01a1n 100 ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i cho cu\u1ed9c s\u1ed1ng ti\u1ec7n nghi.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li><strong>5 ph&uacute;t \u0111\u1ebfn:<\/strong>&nbsp;Tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ecdc c\u1ea5p 1, 2, 3, \u0110\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng, \u0110\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc M\u1edf TP.HCM (chi nh&aacute;nh B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng), \u0110\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc Th\u1ee7 D\u1ea7u M\u1ed9t, Big C, b\u1ebfn xe B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng, CGV, c&ocirc;ng vi&ecirc;n Ph&uacute; C\u01b0\u1eddng, b\u01b0u \u0111i\u1ec7n&hellip;<\/li>\r\n\t<li><strong>10 ph&uacute;t \u0111\u1ebfn:<\/strong>&nbsp;Ng&acirc;n h&agrave;ng BIDV, ng&acirc;n h&agrave;ng Seabank, c&ocirc;ng vi&ecirc;n n\u01b0\u1edbc Thanh L\u1ec5, b\u1ec7nh vi\u1ec7n \u0111a khoa&hellip;<\/li>\r\n\t<li><strong>15 ph&uacute;t \u0111\u1ebfn:<\/strong>&nbsp;AEON Mall, Co.op Mart, s&acirc;n v\u1eadn \u0111\u1ed9ng G&ograve; \u0110\u1eadu, ng&acirc;n h&agrave;ng Vietcombank, ng&acirc;n h&agrave;ng \u0110&ocirc;ng &Aacute;&hellip;<\/li>\r\n\t<li>\r\n\t<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"655\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/5(6).jpg\" width=\"1023\" \/>\r\n\t<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n\t<\/figure>\r\n\r\n\t<p><em><strong>Ngu\u1ed3n:&nbsp;https:\/\/c-skyview.com.vn\/<\/strong><\/em><\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n<\/ul>","noidung_en":"","noidung_cn":null,"noidung_jp":null,"tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":null,"tags_jp":null,"seo_name":"can-ho-c-sky-view-binh-duong","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"5","icon":"1691637473_1.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"dowload_text":"","duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1691651272","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"36","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"C\u0102N H\u1ed8 C-SKY VIEW B\u00ccNH D\u01af\u01a0NG","seo_title_en":"","seo_title_cn":null,"seo_title_jp":null,"seo_keywords_vi":"C\u0102N H\u1ed8 C-SKY VIEW B\u00ccNH D\u01af\u01a0NG","seo_keywords_en":"","seo_keywords_cn":null,"seo_keywords_jp":null,"seo_description_vi":"C\u0102N H\u1ed8 C-SKY VIEW B\u00ccNH D\u01af\u01a0NG","seo_description_en":"","seo_description_cn":null,"seo_description_jp":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"1","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","opt3":"0","opt4":"0","opt5":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_1_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_1_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_jp":null,"google_map":"","is_dongdau":"0","time_dongdau":"0"},{"id":"142","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"C\u0102N H\u1ed8 \u0110\u1ea0T PH\u01af\u1edaC THE RIVANA","tenbaiviet_en":"","tenbaiviet_cn":null,"tenbaiviet_jp":null,"mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":null,"mota_jp":null,"noidung_vi":"<h2>T\u1ed4NG QUAN C\u0102N H\u1ed8 THE RIVANA<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<section data-element_type=\"section\" data-id=\"ba4d762\">\r\n<p><a href=\"http:\/\/rivana.vn\/\">C\u0103n h\u1ed9 The Rivana<\/a>&nbsp;n\u1eb1m ngay m\u1eb7t ti\u1ec1n Qu\u1ed1c l\u1ed9 13,&nbsp;Ph\u01b0\u1eddng V\u0129nh Ph&uacute;, Th&agrave;nh Ph\u1ed1 Thu\u1eadn An, T\u1ec9nh B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng. \u0110&acirc;y l&agrave; d\u1ef1 &aacute;n c\u0103n h\u1ed9 chung c\u01b0 \u0111\u1ea7u tay c\u1ee7a&nbsp;<a href=\"http:\/\/rivana.vn\/\">ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 \u0110\u1ea1t Ph\u01b0\u1edbc<\/a>, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 b&agrave;i b\u1ea3n, n\u1eb1m tr&ecirc;n&nbsp;khu \u0111\u1ea5t r\u1ed9ng g\u1ea7n 12,000m2 v\u1edbi m\u1eadt \u0111\u1ed9 x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng ch\u1ec9 38%. T\u1eeb v\u1ecb tr&iacute; d\u1ef1 &aacute;n&nbsp;<a href=\"http:\/\/rivana.vn\/\">The Rivana<\/a>, c\u01b0 d&acirc;n c&oacute; th\u1ec3 nhanh ch&oacute;ng k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i \u0111\u1ebfn trung t&acirc;m TP.HCM th&ocirc;ng qua tr\u1ee5c Qu\u1ed1c L\u1ed9 13, b&ecirc;n c\u1ea1nh nh\u1eefng ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch hi\u1ec7n h\u1eefu xung quanh nh\u01b0: \u0110\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc Lu\u1eadt TP.HCM, B\u1ec7nh vi\u1ec7n qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf H\u1ea1nh Ph&uacute;c, Coopmart B&igrave;nh Tri\u1ec7u&hellip;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<ul>\r\n\t<li>\r\n\t<p>Th\u1eddi gian x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng:Th&aacute;ng 12\/2020<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li>\r\n\t<p>S\u1ed1 Block: 02<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li>\r\n\t<p>S\u1ed1 t\u1ea7ng: 26<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li>\r\n\t<p>S\u1ed1 c\u0103n h\u1ed9: 1020<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li>\r\n\t<p>S\u1ed1 shophouse: 15<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li>\r\n\t<p>M\u1eadt \u0111\u1ed9 x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng: 38%<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li>\r\n\t<p>Di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch c\u0103n h\u1ed9: 50-95m2<\/p>\r\n\t<\/li>\r\n\t<li>\r\n\t<p>Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0:&nbsp;<strong>\u0110\u1ea0T PH\u01af\u1edaC<\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"864\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/6(1).jpg\" width=\"1536\" \/>\r\n\t<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n\t<\/figure>\r\n\r\n\t<h2>V\u1eca TR&Iacute; C\u0102N H\u1ed8 THE RIVANA\u200b<\/h2>\r\n\r\n\t<section data-element_type=\"section\" data-id=\"21542e3\">\r\n\t<p>V\u1ecb tr&iacute; d\u1ef1 &aacute;n The Rivana B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c ngay tr&ecirc;n m\u1eb7t ti\u1ec1n Qu\u1ed1c L\u1ed9 13, Ph\u01b0\u1eddng V\u0129nh Ph&uacute;, TP. Thu\u1eadn An, T\u1ec9nh B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng.\u0110&acirc;y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xem l&agrave; &ldquo;v\u1ecb tr&iacute; v&agrave;ng&rdquo; li\u1ec1n k\u1ec1 trung t&acirc;m h&agrave;nh ch&iacute;nh c\u1ee7a TP. Thu\u1eadn An, c&aacute;ch \u0111\u1ecba ph\u1eadn TP.HCM ch\u1ec9 kho\u1ea3ng 15 ph&uacute;t \u0111i xe.<br \/>\r\n\t<a href=\"http:\/\/rivana.vn\/\">D\u1ef1 &aacute;n The Rivana<\/a>&nbsp;c&ograve;n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h\u01b0\u1edfng l\u1ee3i t\u1eeb giao th&ocirc;ng khi k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i th&ocirc;ng su\u1ed1t v\u1edbi c&aacute;c tuy\u1ebfn \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng quan tr\u1ecdng nh\u01b0 \u0110\u1ea1i l\u1ed9 B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng, \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Th\u1ee7 Khoa Hu&acirc;n, \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Nguy\u1ec5n Th\u1ecb Minh Khai, \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng L&ecirc; H\u1ed3ng Phong, \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Ph\u1ea1m V\u0103n \u0110\u1ed3ng,&hellip;<br \/>\r\n\tNh\u1edd n\u1eb1m ngay v\u1ecb tr&iacute; n&agrave;y, d\u1ef1 &aacute;n The Rivana c&ograve;n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1eeba h\u01b0\u1edfng nhi\u1ec1u thu\u1eadn l\u1ee3i t\u1eeb s\u1ef1 ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n nhanh ch&oacute;ng c\u1ee7a TP. Thu\u1eadn An, t\u1ec9nh B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<p>\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebft, t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ea7u n\u0103m 2020, Thu\u1eadn An \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph&ecirc; duy\u1ec7t th&agrave;nh 1 trong 3 th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 tr\u1ef1c thu\u1ed9c t\u1ec9nh B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng. T\u1eeb \u0111&oacute;, h\u1ea1 t\u1ea7ng c\u1ee7a th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 \u0111&atilde; c&oacute; nh\u1eefng b\u01b0\u1edbc nh\u1ea3y v\u1ecdt v\u1edbi c&aacute;c d\u1ef1 &aacute;n t\u1ea7m c\u1ee1 nh\u01b0:<br \/>\r\n\t&ndash; M\u1edf r\u1ed9ng v&agrave; n&acirc;ng c\u1ea5p \u0111\u1ea1i l\u1ed9 B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng l&ecirc;n 120m<br \/>\r\n\t&ndash; M\u1edf r\u1ed9ng tuy\u1ebfn qu\u1ed1c l\u1ed9 13 \u0111o\u1ea1n TP.HCM \u0111i B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng l&ecirc;n th&agrave;nh 8 l&agrave;n xe<br \/>\r\n\tTheo kh\u1ea3o s&aacute;t, Thu\u1eadn An \u0111ang l&agrave; khu v\u1ef1c c&oacute; t\u1ed1c \u0111\u1ed9 t\u0103ng gi&aacute; b&aacute;n v&agrave; gi&aacute; thu&ecirc; b\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ed9ng s\u1ea3n cao nh\u1ea5t t\u1ea1i t\u1ec9nh B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7n nay. C&aacute;c d\u1ef1 &aacute;n chung c\u01b0 t\u1ea1i th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 Thu\u1eadn An, \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t l&agrave; tr&ecirc;n tr\u1ee5c qu\u1ed1c l&ocirc; 13 (\u0111\u1ea1i l\u1ed9 B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng) hi\u1ec7n \u0111ang&nbsp;s\u1edf h\u1eefu m\u1ee9c gi&aacute; cho thu&ecirc; c\u0103n h\u1ed9 h\u1ea5p d\u1eabn nh\u1ea5t, cao g\u1ea5p \u0111&ocirc;i D\u0129 An, g\u1ea5p r\u01b0\u1ee1i Th\u1ee7 D\u1ea7u M\u1ed9t v&agrave; g\u1ea7n ti\u1ec7m c\u1eadn v\u1edbi gi&aacute; thu&ecirc; m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 chung c\u01b0 t\u1ea1i&nbsp;khu \u0110&ocirc;ng TP.HCM.<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"1024\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/3(13).jpg\" width=\"961\" \/>\r\n\t<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n\t<\/figure>\r\n\r\n\t<h2>TI\u1ec6N &Iacute;CH C\u0102N H\u1ed8 THE RIVANA<\/h2>\r\n\r\n\t<p><a href=\"http:\/\/rivana.vn\/\">C\u0103n h\u1ed9 The Rivana B&igrave;nh D\u01b0\u01a1ng<\/a>&nbsp;c&oacute; di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch khu&ocirc;n vi&ecirc;n l&ecirc;n \u0111\u1ebfn g\u1ea7n 12,000m2. Trong khi \u0111&oacute;, m\u1eadt \u0111\u1ed9 x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng ch\u1ec9 chi\u1ebfm 38%, ph\u1ea7n l\u1edbn di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch \u0111\u1ea5t c&ograve;n l\u1ea1i d&agrave;nh cho ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch n\u1ed9i khu. Do \u0111&oacute;, d\u1ef1 &aacute;n The Rivana r\u1ea5t ph&ugrave; h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng gia \u0111&igrave;nh tr\u1ebb, hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i, h\u01b0\u1edbng \u0111\u1ebfn cu\u1ed9c s\u1ed1ng chan h&ograve;a c&ugrave;ng c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng v&agrave; thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n.<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<p>C&aacute;c ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch n\u1ed5i b\u1eadt t\u1ea1i&nbsp;<a href=\"http:\/\/rivana.vn\/\">d\u1ef1 &aacute;n The Rivana Thu\u1eadn An<\/a>&nbsp;d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang b\u1ecb l&ecirc;n \u0111\u1ebfn 25 ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch, trong \u0111&oacute; ph\u1ea3i k\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn nh\u01b0:&nbsp;S\u1ea3nh \u0111&oacute;n,&nbsp;Ti\u1ec3u c\u1ea3nh th&aacute;c n\u01b0\u1edbc,&nbsp;S\u1ea3nh l\u1ec5 t&acirc;n,&nbsp;Khu v\u1ef1c \u0111&oacute;n tr\u1ea3 kh&aacute;ch,&nbsp;S&acirc;n b&oacute;ng r\u1ed5,&nbsp;S&acirc;n ch\u01a1i tr\u1ebb em,&nbsp;Khu v\u1ef1c \u0111a ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng,&nbsp;Khu n\u01b0\u1edbng BBQ ngo&agrave;i tr\u1eddi,&nbsp;\u0110\u01b0\u1eddng ch\u1ea1y b\u1ed9 ngo&agrave;i tr\u1eddi,&nbsp;H\u1ed3 b\u01a1i tr&agrave;n b\u1edd,&nbsp;H\u1ed3 b\u01a1i cho tr\u1ebb em,&nbsp;B\u1ed3n ng&acirc;m ch&acirc;n,&nbsp;H\u1ed3 s\u1ee5c Jacuzzi,&nbsp;Clubhouse,&nbsp;Ph&ograve;ng Gym&hellip;.<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"576\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/9.jpg\" width=\"1024\" \/>\r\n\t<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n\t<\/figure>\r\n\r\n\t<h2>THI\u1ebeT K\u1ebe C\u0102N H\u1ed8 THE RIVANA<\/h2>\r\n\r\n\t<section data-element_type=\"section\" data-id=\"dd5ca8b\">\r\n\t<p>D\u1ef1 &aacute;n C\u0103n h\u1ed9 The Rivana \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng theo d\u1ea1ng s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp &ldquo;Module&rdquo;, m\u1ed7i c\u0103n h\u1ed9 l&agrave; m\u1ed9t &ldquo;Module&rdquo; nh\u1ecf trong t\u1ed5ng th\u1ec3 to&agrave;n b\u1ed9 c&aacute;c c\u0103n h\u1ed9 The Rivana. M\u1ed7i &ldquo;Moldule&rdquo; \u0111&oacute; l\u1ea1i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c &nbsp;thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf t\u1ec9 m\u1ec9 theo phong c&aacute;ch t\u1ed1i gi\u1ea3n hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i &ldquo;Minimalism&rdquo;.<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<p>Phong c&aacute;ch t\u1ed1i gi\u1ea3n ch&uacute; tr\u1ecdng vi\u1ec7c gi\u1ea3m thi\u1ec3u t\u1ed1i \u0111a vi\u1ec7c trang tr&iacute; trong kh&ocirc;ng gian n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t, k\u1ebft h\u1ee3p s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng c&oacute; ch\u1ee7 \u0111&iacute;ch &nbsp;c&aacute;c m\u1ea3ng t\u01b0\u1eddng, s&agrave;n v&agrave; &aacute;nh s&aacute;ng t\u1ef1 nhi&ecirc;n ch&iacute;nh l&agrave; nh\u1eefng y\u1ebfu t\u1ed1 quan tr\u1ecdng l&agrave;m n&ecirc;n v\u1ebb \u0111\u1eb9p c\u1ee7a phong c&aacute;ch t\u1ed1i gi\u1ea3n<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<p>V\u1edbi nh\u1ecbp \u0111\u1ed9 cu\u1ed9c s\u1ed1ng ng&agrave;y c&agrave;ng nhanh, m\u1ed9t kh&ocirc;ng gian tho&aacute;ng \u0111&atilde;ng, tr&agrave;n ng\u1eadp &aacute;nh s&aacute;ng tr\u1edf th&agrave;nh \u0111i\u1ec1u m&agrave; m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi m\u01a1 \u01b0\u1edbc. Platon, nh&agrave; tri\u1ebft h\u1ecdc Hy l\u1ea1p c\u1ed5 \u0111\u1ea1i, \u0111&atilde; n&oacute;i: &ldquo;C&aacute;i \u0111\u1eb9p c\u1ee7a phong c&aacute;ch, c\u1ee7a s\u1ef1 h&agrave;i ho&agrave;, duy&ecirc;n d&aacute;ng v&agrave; nh\u1ecbp nh&agrave;ng ph\u1ee5 thu\u1ed9c v&agrave;o s\u1ef1 \u0111\u01a1n gi\u1ea3n&rdquo;<\/p>\r\n\r\n\t<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"921\" \u0111\u1eb9p, l&agrave; khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng \u0111\u1ea7u ti&ecirc;n \u1edf khu v\u1ef1c \u0110&ocirc;ng Nam &Aacute; \u0111\u1ea1t chu\u1ea9n th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u Sheraton Grand, gia nh\u1eadp b\u1ed9 s\u01b0u t\u1eadp Sheraton Grand cao c\u1ea5p g\u1ed3m 37 kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n v&agrave; khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng kh&aacute;c tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px 0px 17px; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"color:#2c2f34\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\">T\u1ecda v\u1ecb \u1edf nh\u1eefng \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m du l\u1ecbch thu h&uacute;t nh\u1ea5t th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi, c&aacute;c kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n Sheraton Grand kh\u1eb3ng \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p qua nh\u1eefng tr\u01b0\u1eddng ph&aacute;i ki\u1ebfn tr&uacute;c sang tr\u1ecdng, c&aacute;c nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o v&agrave; d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 cao c\u1ea5p, mang \u0111\u1ebfn cho du kh&aacute;ch nh\u1eefng tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m th\u01b0\u1ee3ng h\u1ea1ng.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"400\" src=\"https:\/\/danangfantasticity.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/12\/Pool-Sheraton-grand-danang-resort-35-truong-sa-ngu-hanh-son-danang-fantasticity-com.jpg\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div class=\"gallery galleryid-53194 gallery-columns-2 gallery-size-full\" id=\"gallery-1\" style=\"text-align:center; margin:-5px -5px 15px\">\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">S\u1edf h\u1eefu v\u1ecb tr&iacute; \u0111\u1eafc \u0111\u1ecba n\u1eb1m tr&ecirc;n b&atilde;i bi\u1ec3n Non N\u01b0\u1edbc, khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng Sheraton Grand \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng c&oacute; \u0111\u1ebfn 258 ph&ograve;ng v&agrave; suites nh&igrave;n ra khung c\u1ea3nh h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i v&ocirc; c\u1ef1c, b&aacute;n \u0111\u1ea3o S\u01a1n Tr&agrave; hay bi\u1ec3n xanh l\u1ea5p l&aacute;nh s&oacute;ng v\u1ed7. C&agrave;ng kh&ocirc;ng th\u1ec3 kh&ocirc;ng nh\u1eafc \u0111\u1ebfn s&aacute;u nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng v&agrave; qu\u1ea7y bar mang \u0111\u1ebfn s\u1ef1 phong ph&uacute; v\u1ec1 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf l\u1eabn \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng v&agrave; \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 ti\u1ec7n nghi hay h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i v&ocirc; c\u1ef1c 250m.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">Ch\u1ec9 c&aacute;ch s&acirc;n bay qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng 20 ph&uacute;t \u0111i xe, Sheraton Grand Danang Resort kh&ocirc;ng ch\u1ec9 n\u1eb1m ngay g\u1ea7n b\u1edd bi\u1ec3n l\u1eebng danh c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 c&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m du l\u1ecbch v&agrave; v\u0103n h&oacute;a n\u1ed1i ti\u1ebfng kh&aacute;c c\u1ee7a th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng, m&agrave; c&ograve;n n\u1eb1m g\u1ea7n nh\u1eefng Di s\u1ea3n V\u0103n h&oacute;a Th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c UNESCO c&ocirc;ng nh\u1eadn nh\u01b0 Ph\u1ed1 c\u1ed5 H\u1ed9i An hay C\u1ed1 \u0111&ocirc; Hu\u1ebf. Khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng b&ecirc;n b\u1edd b&atilde;i bi\u1ec3n Non N\u01b0\u1edbc bao g\u1ed3m hai khu kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n cao 6 t\u1ea7ng: khu I g\u1ed3m 130 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 v&agrave; ph&ograve;ng suite, bao g\u1ed3m c\u0103n ph&ograve;ng T\u1ed5ng Th\u1ed1ng sang tr\u1ecdng, trang nh&atilde;; v&agrave; khu II bao g\u1ed3m 128 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 v&agrave; ph&ograve;ng suite, v\u1edbi ph&ograve;ng T\u1ed5ng Th\u1ed1ng \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p c&oacute; l\u1ed1i \u0111i VIP, thang m&aacute;y ri&ecirc;ng v&agrave; b&atilde;i \u0111&aacute;p\/ c\u1ea5t c&aacute;nh m&aacute;y bay tr\u1ef1c th\u0103ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"400\" src=\"https:\/\/danangfantasticity.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/12\/Deluxe-king-bedroom-seaview-Sheraton-grand-danang-resort-35-truong-sa-ngu-hanh-son-danang-fantasticity-com.jpg\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ec1u c&oacute; ban c&ocirc;ng ri&ecirc;ng, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang tr&iacute; theo phong c&aacute;ch c\u1ed5 \u0111i\u1ec3n qu&yacute; ph&aacute;i pha l\u1eabn v\u1edbi v&agrave;i \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng n&eacute;t \u0111\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u1ea1i, t\u1ea1o ra m\u1ed9t kh&ocirc;ng gian trang tr\u1ecdng \u1ea5m c&uacute;ng, v&agrave; \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o. C&aacute;c ph&ograve;ng ng\u1ee7 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf h\u01b0\u1edbng v\u1ec1 ph&iacute;a v\u1ecbnh bi\u1ec3n, t\u1ea1o c\u1ea3m gi&aacute;c g\u1ea7n g\u0169i v\u1edbi thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n, nh\u1eb1m \u0111em l\u1ea1i khung c\u1ea3nh \u0111\u1eb9p nh\u1ea5t. N\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b&agrave;y bi\u1ec7n t\u1ec9 m\u1ec9, mang \u0111\u1eadm tr\u01b0\u1eddng ph&aacute;i sang tr\u1ecdng, c&ugrave;ng nh\u1eefng n&eacute;t ch\u1ea5m ph&aacute; n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t sinh \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a nhi\u1ec1u m&agrave;u s\u1eafc v&agrave; khung c\u1ea3nh qua khung c\u1eeda r\u1ed9ng, l&agrave;m n\u1ed5i b\u1eadt s\u1ef1 sinh \u0111\u1ed9ng v&agrave; \u0111\u1eb9p \u0111\u1ebd c\u1ee7a thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n bao quanh khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng.<\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"400\" src=\"https:\/\/danangfantasticity.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/12\/khu-nghi-duong-sheraton-grand-da-nang-chao-don-quy-khach-den-voi-nhung-ki-nghi-mua-le-hoi-tran-ngap-niem-vui-03.jpg\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n<\/div>","noidung_en":"<div style=\"margin: 0px 0px 17px; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"color:#2c2f34\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\">Khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng Sheraton Grand Danang Resort t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c tr&ecirc;n b&atilde;i bi\u1ec3n Non N\u01b0\u1edbc c&aacute;t tr\u1eafng xinh \u0111\u1eb9p, l&agrave; khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng \u0111\u1ea7u ti&ecirc;n \u1edf khu v\u1ef1c \u0110&ocirc;ng Nam &Aacute; \u0111\u1ea1t chu\u1ea9n th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u Sheraton Grand, gia nh\u1eadp b\u1ed9 s\u01b0u t\u1eadp Sheraton Grand cao c\u1ea5p g\u1ed3m 37 kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n v&agrave; khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng kh&aacute;c tr&ecirc;n to&agrave;n th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"margin:0px 0px 17px; text-align:justify\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing:border-box\"><span style=\"color:#2c2f34\"><span style=\"background-color:#ffffff\">T\u1ecda v\u1ecb \u1edf nh\u1eefng \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m du l\u1ecbch thu h&uacute;t nh\u1ea5t th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi, c&aacute;c kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n Sheraton Grand kh\u1eb3ng \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p qua nh\u1eefng tr\u01b0\u1eddng ph&aacute;i ki\u1ebfn tr&uacute;c sang tr\u1ecdng, c&aacute;c nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o v&agrave; d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 cao c\u1ea5p, mang \u0111\u1ebfn cho du kh&aacute;ch nh\u1eefng tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m th\u01b0\u1ee3ng h\u1ea1ng.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"400\" src=\"https:\/\/danangfantasticity.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/12\/Pool-Sheraton-grand-danang-resort-35-truong-sa-ngu-hanh-son-danang-fantasticity-com.jpg\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div class=\"gallery galleryid-53194 gallery-columns-2 gallery-size-full\" id=\"gallery-1\" style=\"text-align:center; margin:-5px -5px 15px\">\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">S\u1edf h\u1eefu v\u1ecb tr&iacute; \u0111\u1eafc \u0111\u1ecba n\u1eb1m tr&ecirc;n b&atilde;i bi\u1ec3n Non N\u01b0\u1edbc, khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng Sheraton Grand \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng c&oacute; \u0111\u1ebfn 258 ph&ograve;ng v&agrave; suites nh&igrave;n ra khung c\u1ea3nh h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i v&ocirc; c\u1ef1c, b&aacute;n \u0111\u1ea3o S\u01a1n Tr&agrave; hay bi\u1ec3n xanh l\u1ea5p l&aacute;nh s&oacute;ng v\u1ed7. C&agrave;ng kh&ocirc;ng th\u1ec3 kh&ocirc;ng nh\u1eafc \u0111\u1ebfn s&aacute;u nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng v&agrave; qu\u1ea7y bar mang \u0111\u1ebfn s\u1ef1 phong ph&uacute; v\u1ec1 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf l\u1eabn \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng v&agrave; \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 ti\u1ec7n nghi hay h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i v&ocirc; c\u1ef1c 250m.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">Ch\u1ec9 c&aacute;ch s&acirc;n bay qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng 20 ph&uacute;t \u0111i xe, Sheraton Grand Danang Resort kh&ocirc;ng ch\u1ec9 n\u1eb1m ngay g\u1ea7n b\u1edd bi\u1ec3n l\u1eebng danh c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 c&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m du l\u1ecbch v&agrave; v\u0103n h&oacute;a n\u1ed1i ti\u1ebfng kh&aacute;c c\u1ee7a th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng, m&agrave; c&ograve;n n\u1eb1m g\u1ea7n nh\u1eefng Di s\u1ea3n V\u0103n h&oacute;a Th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c UNESCO c&ocirc;ng nh\u1eadn nh\u01b0 Ph\u1ed1 c\u1ed5 H\u1ed9i An hay C\u1ed1 \u0111&ocirc; Hu\u1ebf. Khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng b&ecirc;n b\u1edd b&atilde;i bi\u1ec3n Non N\u01b0\u1edbc bao g\u1ed3m hai khu kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n cao 6 t\u1ea7ng: khu I g\u1ed3m 130 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 v&agrave; ph&ograve;ng suite, bao g\u1ed3m c\u0103n ph&ograve;ng T\u1ed5ng Th\u1ed1ng sang tr\u1ecdng, trang nh&atilde;; v&agrave; khu II bao g\u1ed3m 128 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 v&agrave; ph&ograve;ng suite, v\u1edbi ph&ograve;ng T\u1ed5ng Th\u1ed1ng \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p c&oacute; l\u1ed1i \u0111i VIP, thang m&aacute;y ri&ecirc;ng v&agrave; b&atilde;i \u0111&aacute;p\/ c\u1ea5t c&aacute;nh m&aacute;y bay tr\u1ef1c th\u0103ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"400\" src=\"https:\/\/danangfantasticity.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/12\/Deluxe-king-bedroom-seaview-Sheraton-grand-danang-resort-35-truong-sa-ngu-hanh-son-danang-fantasticity-com.jpg\" width=\"600\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ec1u c&oacute; ban c&ocirc;ng ri&ecirc;ng, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang tr&iacute; theo phong c&aacute;ch c\u1ed5 \u0111i\u1ec3n qu&yacute; ph&aacute;i pha l\u1eabn v\u1edbi v&agrave;i \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng n&eacute;t \u0111\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u1ea1i, t\u1ea1o ra m\u1ed9t kh&ocirc;ng gian trang tr\u1ecdng \u1ea5m c&uacute;ng, v&agrave; \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o. C&aacute;c ph&ograve;ng ng\u1ee7 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf h\u01b0\u1edbng v\u1ec1 ph&iacute;a v\u1ecbnh bi\u1ec3n, t\u1ea1o c\u1ea3m gi&aacute;c g\u1ea7n g\u0169i v\u1edbi thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n, nh\u1eb1m \u0111em l\u1ea1i khung c\u1ea3nh \u0111\u1eb9p nh\u1ea5t. N\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b&agrave;y bi\u1ec7n t\u1ec9 m\u1ec9, mang \u0111\u1eadm tr\u01b0\u1eddng ph&aacute;i sang tr\u1ecdng, c&ugrave;ng nh\u1eefng n&eacute;t ch\u1ea5m ph&aacute; n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t sinh \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a nhi\u1ec1u m&agrave;u s\u1eafc v&agrave; khung c\u1ea3nh qua khung c\u1eeda r\u1ed9ng, l&agrave;m n\u1ed5i b\u1eadt s\u1ef1 sinh \u0111\u1ed9ng v&agrave; \u0111\u1eb9p \u0111\u1ebd c\u1ee7a thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n bao quanh khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng.<\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\r\n\r\n<div industry.<\/p>","mota_cn":null,"mota_jp":null,"noidung_vi":"<p><span style=\"color:#2c3e50;\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">The house on the outskirts of Hanoi is divided into 3 main zones, inspired by the traditional three-room house of the northern countryside.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div 560-square-meter plot of land in Thach That, Hanoi, architects Ta Dinh Van, Nguyen Nhu Thanh, Nguyen Hoang Tu (365 design) have designed and constructed a 200-square-meter house, the rest are used as view. Between the three areas of the house are courtyards and gardens.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"328\" src=\"\/2021_obtvietnam\/datafiles\/images\/du-an\/7-1535007559_680x0.jpg\" width=\"492\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"color:#2c3e50;\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Following the trend of bringing nature and trees to life, the house is designed with maximum openings, helping people to approach and get close to nature.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"332\" src=\"\/2021_obtvietnam\/datafiles\/images\/du-an\/CricketHouse-day-01_680x0.jpg\" width=\"498\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"color:#2c3e50;\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Sharing with Archdaily, the world&#39;s leading architecture website, the group of architects said, after a lot of ideas on paper, this is a project that they spent a lot of time and enthusiasm to complete. health.<\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>","noidung_en":"<p>The house on the outskirts of Hanoi is divided into 3 main zones, inspired by the traditional three-room house of the northern countryside.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"453\" src=\"\/2021_obtvietnam\/datafiles\/images\/du-an\/6_680x0.jpg\" width=\"680\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<p>On a 560-square-meter plot of land in Thach That, Hanoi, architects Ta Dinh Van, Nguyen Nhu Thanh, Nguyen Hoang Tu (365 design) have designed and constructed a 200-square-meter house, the rest are used as view. NGH\u1ec8 D\u01af\u1ee0NG NOVAWORLD H\u1ed2 TR\u00c0M","tenbaiviet_en":"","tenbaiviet_cn":null,"tenbaiviet_jp":null,"mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":null,"mota_jp":null,"noidung_vi":"<p>Novaworld H\u1ed3 Tr&agrave;m thu\u1ed9c qu\u1ea7n th\u1ec3 gi\u1ea3i tr&iacute; ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p do Novaland Group ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ra m\u1eaft song song c&ugrave;ng v\u1edbi d\u1ef1 &aacute;n nh&agrave; ph\u1ed1 Aqua City &amp; Novaworld Phan Thi\u1ebft t\u1ea1i B&igrave;nh Thu\u1eadn.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u0110&acirc;y l&agrave; d\u1ef1 &aacute;n n\u1eb1m trong chu\u1ed7i chi\u1ebfn l\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1ea5n s&acirc;u v&agrave;o ph&acirc;n kh&uacute;c ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng c\u1ee7a Novaland t\u1ea1i c&aacute;c th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng m\u1edbi, v\u1edbi s\u1ef1 kh&aacute;c bi\u1ec7t thu\u1ed9c v\u1ec1 quy m&ocirc; si&ecirc;u kh\u1ee7ng v&agrave; s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch l&ecirc;n \u0111\u1ebfn 1000 h\u1ea1ng m\u1ee5c tr\u1ea3i d&agrave;i theo cung \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng ven bi\u1ec3n t\u1eeb L\u1ed9c An \u0111\u1ebfn B&igrave;nh Ch&acirc;u.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><a href=\"https:\/\/aquacityvn.vn\/novaworld-ho-tram\/\">NovaWorld H\u1ed3 Tr&agrave;m<\/a>&nbsp;l&agrave; t\u1ed5 h\u1ee3p Du l\u1ecbch Ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng Gi\u1ea3i tr&iacute; quy m&ocirc; t\u1edbi 1.000 ha, v\u1edbi \u0111a d\u1ea1ng phong c&aacute;ch ki\u1ebfn tr&uacute;c c&ugrave;ng h\u1ec7 sinh th&aacute;i ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch phong ph&uacute;, mang \u0111\u1ebfn tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m \u0111\u1eb7c s\u1eafc v&agrave; cao c\u1ea5p cho nhi\u1ec1u nh&oacute;m kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>D\u1ef1 &aacute;n NovaWorld H\u1ed3 Tr&agrave;m c\u0169ng li\u1ec1n k\u1ec1 nhi\u1ec1u d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 du l\u1ecbch \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o nh\u01b0 Su\u1ed1i kho&aacute;ng n&oacute;ng B&igrave;nh Ch&acirc;u, Khu b\u1ea3o t\u1ed3n B&igrave;nh Ch&acirc;u Ph\u01b0\u1edbc B\u1eedu, s&acirc;n Golf thu\u1ed9c h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1eb9p nh\u1ea5t th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi&hellip;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"487\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/6(2).jpg\" width=\"650\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n\r\n<h2>V\u1eca TR&Iacute; D\u1ef0 &Aacute;N<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>V\u1ecb tr&iacute; l&agrave; m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng \u0111i\u1ec1u quan tr\u1ecdng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nhi\u1ec1u kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng quan t&acirc;m h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ea7u khi t&igrave;m hi\u1ec3u v\u1ec1 c&aacute;c d\u1ef1 &aacute;n b\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ed9ng s\u1ea3n, v&agrave; Novaworld B&igrave;nh Ch&acirc;u \u0111&atilde; l&agrave;m r\u1ea5t t\u1ed1t \u0111i\u1ec1u n&agrave;y khi 4 ph&iacute;a l\u1ea7n l\u01b0\u1ee3t gi&aacute;p v\u1edbi khi d&acirc;n c\u01b0 (ph&iacute;a \u0110&ocirc;ng B\u1eafc), tr\u1ee5c \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Nguy\u1ec5n V\u0103n C\u1eeb (ph&iacute;a \u0110&ocirc;ng Nam), r\u1ea1ch Th\u1ee7 L\u1ef1u (ph&iacute;a T&acirc;y Nam) v&agrave; \u0111\u1ea5t tr\u1ed1ng (ph&iacute;a T&acirc;y B\u1eafc) \u0111em \u0111\u1ebfn nhi\u1ec1u gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c di chuy\u1ec3n, \u0111i l\u1ea1i cho c\u01b0 d&acirc;n.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Ngo&agrave;i ra,<strong>&nbsp;v\u1ecb tr&iacute; c\u1ee7a d\u1ef1 &aacute;n Novaworld H\u1ed3 Tr&agrave;m B&igrave;nh Ch&acirc;u&nbsp;<\/strong>c&ograve;n l&agrave; trung t&acirc;m k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i&nbsp;\u0111\u1ebfn&nbsp;c&aacute;c c\u1ee5m Du L\u1ecbch n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng c\u1ee7a t\u1ec9nh&nbsp;B&agrave; R\u1ecba-V\u0169ng T&agrave;u nh\u01b0 c\u1ee5m du l\u1ecbch Long H\u1ea3i-Ph\u01b0\u1edbc H\u1ea3i, c\u1ee5m du l\u1ecbch H\u1ed3 C\u1ed1c &ndash; H\u1ed3 Tr&agrave;m, c\u1ee5m du l\u1ecbch B&igrave;nh Ch&acirc;u-Ph\u01b0\u1edbc B\u1eedu hay c&aacute;ch \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m du l\u1ecbch n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng nh\u01b0 bi\u1ec3n Long H\u1ea3i, \u0111\u1ea3o Long S\u01a1n (c&aacute;ch 10-12 km), su\u1ed1i n\u01b0\u1edbc n&oacute;ng - r\u1eebng nguy&ecirc;n sinh B&igrave;nh Ch&acirc;u (30-40 km) \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ea1o \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n thu\u1eadn ti\u1ec7n cho nh\u1eefng chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i du l\u1ecbch, ng&agrave;y ngh\u1ec9, x\u1ea3 h\u01a1i cho chu\u1ed7i ng&agrave;y l&agrave;m vi\u1ec7c c\u0103ng th\u1eb3ng, m\u1ec7t m\u1ecfi c&ugrave;ng gia \u0111&igrave;nh, b\u1ea1n b&egrave; v&agrave; ng\u01b0\u1eddi th&acirc;n cho c\u01b0 d&acirc;n n\u01a1i \u0111&acirc;y.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>D\u1ef1 &aacute;n n&agrave;y c&agrave;ng tr\u1edf n&ecirc;n &ldquo;\u0111\u1eaft gi&aacute;&rdquo; h\u01a1n khi t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c t\u1ea1i ngay c\u1eeda ng\u1ecf c\u1ee7a khu v\u1ef1c. Ch\u1ec9 c&aacute;ch 700m tuy\u1ebfn Cao t\u1ed1c Bi&ecirc;n H&ograve;a &ndash; V\u0169ng T&agrave;u v&agrave; c&aacute;c tuy\u1ebfn \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng tr\u1ecdng \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xem l&agrave; h&agrave;nh lang kinh t\u1ebf ch\u1ee7 lchurcuar khu v\u1ef1c \u0110&ocirc;ng Nam B\u1ed9 nh\u01b0 qu\u1ed1c l\u1ed9 51, 55, 56. Sinh s\u1ed1ng t\u1ea1i&nbsp;<strong>Novaworld B&igrave;nh Ch&acirc;u<\/strong>, b\u1ea1n ho&agrave;n to&agrave;n c&oacute; th\u1ec3 d\u1ec5 d&agrave;ng di chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ebfn nhi\u1ec1u ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch ngo\u1ea1i khu nh\u01b0&nbsp;s&acirc;n bay Qu\u1ed1c T\u1ebf Long Th&agrave;nh (40km), th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 H\u1ed3 Ch&iacute; Minh&nbsp;(90km) hay resort&nbsp;M\u0169i N&eacute; &ndash; Phan Thi\u1ebft.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"900\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/8.jpg\" width=\"1600\" d\u01b0\u1ee1ng, nh&agrave; ph\u1ed1, shophouse, c\u0103n h\u1ed9, kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n, khu du l\u1ecbch, khu ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch<\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>\u2705 Quy m&ocirc;<\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td>Kho\u1ea3ng 1000 ha di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c quy ho\u1ea1ch theo m&ocirc; h&igrave;nh Khu du l\u1ecbch ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng sinh th&aacute;i \u0111a ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng (Intergrated Resort), bao g\u1ed3m c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m l\u01b0u tr&uacute; (<strong>100 m2 &ndash; 500 m2\/c\u0103n<\/strong>) v&agrave; c&aacute;c c\u1ee5m ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch \u0111\u1eb7c s\u1eafc.<\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>\u2705 Kh\u1edfi c&ocirc;ng x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng<\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td>N\u0103m 2019<\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>\u2705 D\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn b&agrave;n giao<\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td>N\u0103m B&Igrave;NH<\/strong><\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<p data-css=\"tve-u-17228f059ed\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Gi\u1eefa m&agrave;u xanh l\u01b0u mang t&ecirc;n Ivory Villas &amp; Resort. \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c quy ho\u1ea1ch tr&ecirc;n di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch 66ha, Ivory Villas &amp; Resort g\u1ed3m 4 ph&acirc;n khu ch&iacute;nh, m\u1ed7i C&aacute;ch H\u1ed9i An 30 ph&uacute;t l&aacute;i xe.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n 5 sao g\u1ed3m 12 t\u1ea7ng.
